name: L’Amp Team Members
author: Dave Nieuwenhuijzen

sections.description: A plugin to display an overview of the members of your team, you can sort them by category or display as one big team.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the folder l-amp-team-members and it’s contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [l-amp-tm] on a page where you want the overview
